attributes.action: David Cameron is Not Fit to Hold Office as P.M.
attributes.additional_details:
I want another General Election to take place because too few people have confidence in the experience and skills of the current Prime Minister at such important and decisive times for this country.

He is clearly out of his depth, has insufficient experience and was not properly elected into power with a clear single party majority. Mr Clegg received too few seats to be allowed to play such a vital role in the formation of this very unpopular administration.
